name: Rogue Reckoning
description:
Fight your way to the center of the galaxy in this chess-inspired roguelike!

Credits:

  • Eric McCormick: Dungeon Generation and AI
  • Ian Hunter: Art and UI
  • Daniel Toth: Map Generation and UI
  • Weylan Wang: Weapons and Sound

Devblog: calroguelike.tumblr.com

Completed for the Game Design and Development Decal final project at UC Berkeley.
